verses.verse: "Now at that time <WH6256> Michael, <WH4317> the great <WH1419> prince <WH8269> who stands <WH5975> [guard] over <WH5921> the sons <WH1121> of your people, <WH5971> will arise. <WH5975> And there will be a time <WH6256> of distress <WH6869> such <WH834> as never <WH3808> occurred <WH1961> since <WH4480> there was a nation <WH1471> until <WH5704> that time; <WH6256> and at that time <WH6256> your people, <WH5971> everyone <WH3605> who is found <WH4672> written <WH3789> in the book, <WH5612> will be rescued. <WH4422>

"And many <WH7227> of those who <WH3463> sleep <WH3463> in the dust <WH6083> of the ground <WH127> will awake, <WH9516> these <WH428> to everlasting <WH5769> life, <WH9132> but the others <WH428> to disgrace <WH2781> [and] everlasting <WH5769> contempt. <WH1860>

"And those who have <WH7919> insight <WH7919> will shine <WH9100> brightly <WH9100> like the brightness <WH2096> of the expanse <WH7549> of heaven, <WH7549> and those who lead <WH6663> the many <WH7227> to righteousness, <WH6663> like the stars <WH3556> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>

"But as for you, Daniel, <WH1840> conceal <WH5640> these words <WH1697> and seal <WH2856> up the book <WH5612> until <WH5704> the end <WH7093> of time; <WH6256> many <WH7227> will go <WH7751> back <WH7751> and forth, <WH7751> and knowledge <WH1847> will increase. <WH7235>"

Then I, Daniel, <WH1840> looked <WH7200> and behold, <WH2009> two <WH8147> others <WH312> were standing, <WH5975> one <WH259> on this <WH2008> bank <WH8193> of the river, <WH2975> and the other <WH259> on that bank <WH8193> of the river. <WH2975>

And one said <WH559> to the man <WH376> dressed <WH3847> in linen, <WH906> who <WH834> was above <WH4480> <WH4605> the waters <WH4325> of the river, <WH2975> "How <WH4970> long <WH5704> <WH4970> [will it be] until <WH5704> the end <WH7093> of [these] wonders <WH6382>?"

And I heard <WH8085> the man <WH376> dressed <WH3847> in linen, <WH906> who <WH834> was above <WH4480> <WH4605> the waters <WH4325> of the river, <WH2975> as he raised <WH7311> his right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> and his left <WH8040> toward <WH413> heaven, <WH8064> and swore <WH7650> by Him who <WH2416> lives <WH2416> forever <WH5769> that it would be for a time, <WH4150> times, <WH4150> and half <WH2677> [a time;] and as soon as they finish <WH3615> shattering <WH5310> the power <WH3027> of the holy <WH6944> people, <WH5971> all <WH3605> these <WH428> [events] will be completed. <WH3615>
As for me, I heard <WH8085> but could not understand; <WH995> so I said, <WH559> "My lord, <WH113> what <WH4100> [will be] the outcome <WH319> of these <WH428> [events?]"
And he said, <WH559> "Go <WH1980> [your way,] Daniel, <WH1840> for [these] words <WH1697> are concealed <WH5640> and sealed <WH2856> up until <WH5704> the end <WH7093> time. <WH6256>

"Many <WH7227> will be purged, <WH1305> purified <WH3835> and refined; <WH6884> but the wicked <WH7563> will act <WH7561> wickedly, <WH7561> and none <WH3808> <WH3605> of the wicked <WH7563> will understand, <WH995> but those who have <WH7919> insight <WH7919> will understand. <WH995>

"And from the time <WH6256> that the regular <WH8548> sacrifice <WH8548> is abolished, <WH5493> and the abomination <WH8251> of desolation <WH8074> is set <WH5414> up, [there will be] 1290 days. <WH3117>
"How blessed <WH835> is he who keeps waiting <WH2442> and attains <WH5060> to the 1335 days! <WH3117>

"But as for you, go <WH1980> [your way] to the end; <WH7093> then you will enter <WH5117> into rest <WH5117> and rise <WH5975> [again] for your allotted <WH1486> portion <WH1486> at the end <WH7093> of the age. <WH3117>"
